data.name: Settings_Common_Language_Description
data.value: Select the display language for the software.

data.name: Settings_Common_Theme_Description
data.value: Select the display theme for the software.

data.name: Settings_Behavior_ChatHotkey_Description
data.value: Set a hotkey to invoke the chat window at any time.

data.name: Settings_Model_ModelName_Description
data.value: Specify the name of the model the assistant will use.

data.name: Settings_Model_Temperature_Description
data.value: Higher values yield more imaginative, creative responses; lower values produce more precise, conservative outputs; note that temperatures above 1.0 may cause garbled output in some models.

data.name: Settings_Model_TopP_Description
data.value: Higher values allow a wider range of possible responses; lower values favor the most probable answers; it’s not recommended to modify this alongside the temperature. This setting is only effective for some models. If you encounter an error, try restoring the default value.

data.name: Settings_Model_IsToolCallSupported_Description
data.value: When enabled, for tool-capable large models (e.g., DeepSeek-V3, GPT-4o), the assistant will invoke external tools at appropriate times to extend its capabilities; if the model doesn’t support tool calls, enabling this may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Model_IsWebSearchSupported_Description
data.value: When enabled, for tool-capable large models (e.g., DeepSeek-V3, GPT-4o), the assistant will perform web searches and integrate results before generating responses; if the model doesn’t support tool calls, enabling this may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Plugin_WebSearchEngine_SelectedWebSearchEngineProvider_Description
data.value: Select the service provider for web search engines.

data.name: Settings_Model_WebSearchApiKey_Description
data.value: Specify the API access key for the web search service, obtainable from the provider’s API portal.

data.name: Settings_Plugin_WebSearchEngine_SelectedWebSearchEngineProvider_EndPoint_Description
data.value: Leaving this to default if you dont't know what to do. Must starts with "http(s)://".

data.name: ChatInputBox_ImageButton_ToolTip
data.value: Allow access to aware your screen

data.name: ChatInputBox_ToolCallButton_ToolTip
data.value: Use tools to enhance assistant capabilities

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_BadRequest
data.value: Bad request, possibly due to an incorrect API key or unsupported network/region.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_Unauthorized
data.value: Unauthorized request, possibly due to an incorrect API key or unsupported network/region.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_Forbidden
data.value: Request forbidden, possibly due to an incorrect API key or unsupported network/region.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_InternalServerError
data.value: Server encountered an error, please try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_ServiceUnavailable
data.value: Server unavailable, please try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_GatewayTimeout
data.value: Gateway connection timed out, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_RequestTimeout
data.value: Request connection timed out, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_BadGateway
data.value: Gateway connection error, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_0
data.value: Unknown error, please try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_HostNotFound
data.value: Hostname could not be resolved, please check your DNS settings or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_ConnectionRefused
data.value: Connection refused, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_ConnectionReset
data.value: Connection reset, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_ConnectionAborted
data.value: Connection aborted, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_0
data.value: Unknown error, please try again later.

data.name: SettingsSelectionItem_Common_Language_zh-hant-hk
data.value: 中文 (繁體 香港特別行政區)

data.name: AboutPage_Description
data.value: Perceives your screen content in real-time, breaking down application barriers to provide intelligent assistance that truly fits the current context, transforming your desktop into a seamless, intelligent workspace.

data.name: App_EverywhereIsAlreadyRunning
data.value: Everywhere is already running, please check Tray Icon.

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message2
data.value: Nice to meet you! Let me be your assistant and help you solve problems!

data.name: Settings_Behavior_ChatFloatingWindowPinMode_Description
data.value: Specifies the pin mode for the chat floating window when it is opened. When the window is not fixed, it will be hidden automatically when it loses focus.

data.name: Settings_Model_PresencePenalty_Description
data.value: The higher the value, the more inclined to use different expressions and avoid concept repetition; the lower the value, the more inclined to use repeated concepts or narratives, resulting in more consistent expression. This setting is only effective for some models. If you encounter an error, try restoring the default value.

data.name: Settings_Model_FrequencyPenalty_Description
data.value: The higher the value, the more diverse and rich the vocabulary; the lower the value, the simpler and more straightforward the language. This setting is only effective for some models. If you encounter an error, try restoring the default value.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelProvider_Description
data.value: Select the large language model service provider.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_Description
data.value: Select the large language model (LLM) provided by model provider.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelProvider_Endpoint_Description
data.value: Leaving this to default if you dont't know what to do. Must starts with "http(s)://".

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelProvider_ApiKey_Description
data.value: In case of online models, you need to get from the corresponding official, please refer to the guide for details.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_IsImageInputSupported_Description
data.value: You can upload images in chat context. If you're not sure what you're doing, keep the default value. If the model doesn’t support image inputs, enabling this may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_IsFunctionCallingSupported_Description
data.value: Model can use tools you configured in chat context. If you're not sure what you're doing, keep the default value. If the model doesn’t support function calling, enabling this may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_IsDeepThinkingSupported_Description
data.value: Model can think before replies. If you're not sure what you're doing, keep the default value. If the model doesn’t support deep thinking, enabling this may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_IsWebSearchSupported_Description
data.value: Model can search web before replies. If you're not sure what you're doing, keep the default value. If the model doesn’t support deep thinking, enabling this may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_MaxTokens_Description
data.value: The maximum context length of single chat. If you're not sure what you're doing, keep the default value. Setting this larger than the default value may cause failures.

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelProvider_Schema_Description
data.value: Select API schema. Leaving this to default if you dont't know what to do.

data.name: Settings_Common_IsStartupEnabled_Description
data.value: Everywhere will run automatically after startup. If “Startup as Administrator” is enabled, the current option can only be disabled in administrator mode.

data.name: Settings_Common_IsAdministratorStartupEnabled_Description
data.value: Everywhere will start automatically as administrator. You can only turn this option on or off in administrator mode.

data.name: Settings_Common_RestartAsAdministrator_Description
data.value: Due to operating system restrictions, when running any application as an administrator (elevated permissions), Everywhere may not work correctly when the elevated applications are in focus or trying to interact with a Everywhere feature like "Pick Element". This can be addressed by running Everywhere as administrator.

data.name: Settings_Common_SoftwareUpdate_Toast_AlreadyLatestVersion
data.value: Everywhere is already the latest version.

data.name: Settings_Common_SoftwareUpdate_Description
data.value: Manage software updates for Everywhere. If an update is available, click Update and Everywhere will automatically download and install the latest version. You may need to select “Yes” in the pop-up window during the process.

data.name: Settings_Common_IsAutomaticUpdateCheckEnabled_Description
data.value: If enabled, Everywhere will periodically check for updates (only when Everywhere is running, without adding extra load to the system).

data.name: Settings_Model_SelectedModelDefinition_ModelId_Description
data.value: Model identifier used for API calls, such as gpt-4o. If you are unsure what this is, keep the default value.

data.name: ChatPluginPage_Description
data.value: Chat plugins include built-in plugins and MCP plugins. LLMs that support tool calls will use these plugins at appropriate times (such as searching the web or accessing local files) to gain more powerful functionality.

data.name: Settings_Plugin_WebSearchEngine_SelectedWebSearchEngineProvider_ApiKey_Description
data.value: You need to get from the corresponding official, please refer to the guide for details.

data.name: Settings_Plugin_WebSearchEngine_SelectedWebSearchEngineProvider_SearchEngineId_Description
data.value: (Google only) Provides a programmable search engine ID. For details, refer to the guide.

data.name: NativeChatPlugin_WebSearchEngine_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to search the web before answering, can reduce large language model hallucinations and provide the latest information.

data.name: NativeChatPlugin_Shell_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to execute commands in terminal, allowing direct interaction with the system and offering unlimited possibilities.

data.name: NativeChatPlugin_FileSystem_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to access files, such as enumerating, creating, deleting, renaming, reading, or writing.

data.name: NativeChatPlugin_VisualTree_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to perceive elements on the screen.

data.name: ChangeLogView_Header
data.value: Everywhere has been updated to the latest version 🎉

data.name: ChangeLogView_Content
data.value: I'm still very young, so if you have any problems, feel free to click the link below for feedback, I'll keep on evolving! You're also welcome to click the link below to enter the group discussion, more social media is under construction, so stay tuned. Tip: You can reopen this message by clicking “About - What's new”.

data.name: WelcomeView_SelectModelProviderStep_Message1
data.value: Okay, let's move on to Step 1: choosing a "brain" for Me! My intelligence comes from powerful Large language models (LLMs), which are provided by the specialized service providers listed below. You can choose any one of them to power me.

data.name: WelcomeView_SelectModelProviderStep_Message2
data.value: Please select a provider you have or plan to use, and I'll tell you more about it. Don't worry, Everywhere is just an independent client and is not officially affiliated with them.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_openai_Description
data.value: OpenAI is a popular provider of AI models, known for its GPT series and others. You can register and obtain an API key on their official website. Please check their list of supported countries and regions.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_anthropic_Description
data.value: Anthropic focuses on developing safe and reliable AI models, with its flagship product being the Claude series. Please visit their official website for model details and API pricing.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_google_Description
data.value: Google develops the Gemini series of multimodal AI models. You can obtain an API key through Google AI Studio or Google Cloud Platform. Please verify that the service is available in your region.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_deepseek_Description
data.value: DeepSeek is a company focused on general artificial intelligence, with models that perform well in code generation and Chinese language processing. You can register and get started on their official website.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_moonshot_Description
data.value: Moonshot AI is known for its Kimi intelligent assistant, which supports long-text inputs. The company offers an open platform with API services. For more details, please visit their official website.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_openrouter_Description
data.value: OpenRouter is an API aggregation and routing service that allows you to access a variety of models from multiple providers (such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.) through a single, unified interface. This is very convenient for testing and comparing different models (Including free models). Please refer to their official documentation for pricing and available models.

data.name: WelcomeView_ModelProviderWrapper_siliconflow_Description
data.value: SiliconFlow is an efficient AI inference platform that supports a wide range of open-source and proprietary models (Including free models). It provides developers with flexible, high-performance model deployment and inference services. For specific supported models and pricing, please visit their official website.

data.name: WelcomeView_EnterApiKeyStep_Message1
data.value: Great! Now we need an API key to get started. Please enter or paste it into the text box below. Then click "Verify API key".

data.name: WelcomeView_EnterApiKeyStep_Message2
data.value: Don't worry, your key is highly secure. It's only used for authentication with the model provider, and I won't read it.

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message6
data.value: Tip: You can click “About - Welcome Page” to reopen this message.

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message3
data.value: You can wake me up anytime, everywhere. I can understand your current work context—whether it's emails, articles, or web pages—and help you solve problems more intelligently!

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message4
data.value: If this is your first time using it, I'll guide you through the initial setup in three simple steps.

data.name: WelcomeView_EnterApiKeyStep_Message3
data.value: If you're unsure how to obtain it, you can check out this tutorial I've prepared for you:

data.name: WelcomeView_EnterApiKeyStep_Message4
data.value: Whispered hint: It usually starts with “sk-” or “AI,” so don't miss it!

data.name: WelcomeView_EnterApiKeyStep_Message5
data.value: Also, you can select a model or keep the default.

data.name: WelcomeView_EnterApiKeyStep_Message6
data.value: 🎉 Verify successful! Let's move on to the final step!

data.name: WelcomeView_HotkeyStep_Message1
data.value: Congratulations! Everything is complete. You can wake me up anytime using the shortcut key below.

data.name: WelcomeView_HotkeyStep_Message2
data.value: If there's no response, it might be occupied by other software. You can click to change the shortcut key.

data.name: WelcomeView_TelemetryStep_Message1
data.value: To help me improve, I need to enable “telemetry” to collect anonymous data. This data is used solely for analysis and does not contain or allow the inference of any personally identifiable information about you.

data.name: WelcomeView_TelemetryStep_Message2
data.value: You may choose to send only necessary data; this option will not affect core functionality.

data.name: Settings_Common_DiagnosticData_Description
data.value: To help us improve, we need the “telemetry” to collect anonymous data. This data is used solely for analysis and does not contain or allow the inference of any personally identifiable information about you. You may choose to send only necessary data; this option will not affect core functionality.

data.name: Settings_Behavior_ShowChatStatistics_Description
data.value: If enabled, usage data will be displayed at the end of each conversation round within the chat window.
